snippet: Clive Goodman, former royalty editor of The News of the World, said that he had listened to the voice mails of the former Kate Middleton, Prince William and Prince Harry.
abstract: Clive Goodman, former royalty editor of The News of the World, testifies at long-running phone-hacking trial that he had listened to voice mails of former Kate Middleton, Prince William and Prince Harry.
lead_paragraph: Clive Goodman, former royalty editor of The News of the World, said that he had listened to the voice mails of the former Kate Middleton, Prince William and Prince Harry.

headline.main: Britain: Former Editor Testifies on Hacking of Royals
headline.print_headline: Britain: Former Editor Testifies on Hacking of Royals

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
